thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Hualian Department Store To Transfer Shares In Rajax to Alibaba Unit

title: BRIEF-Beijing Hualian Department Store To Transfer Shares In Rajax to Alibaba Unit

organizations.name: beijing hualian department store co ltd

text:
April 2, 2018 / 4:24   BRIEF-Beijing Hualian Department Store To Transfer Shares In Rajax to Alibaba Unit Reuters Staff 1   Beijing Hualian Department Store Co Ltd : 
* SAYS TO TRANSFER SHARES IN RAJAX, WHOSE MAIN OPERATIONS IS ONLINE DELIVERY PLATFORM ELE.ME, TO ALIBABAâ€™S UNIT ALI PANINI INVESTMENT HOLDING LIMITED FOR $184.7 MILLION 
* SAYS DEAL TO BRING IN ONE-OFF AFTER-TAX INVESTMENT GAINS OF AROUND 430-510 MILLION YUAN ($68.49-$81.23 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2pWHigE Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2785 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
